attributes.action: Nelson Mandela, statue on fourth plinth, Trafalgar Square
attributes.additional_details: This petition is aimed at gaining public support for a statue of the late Nelson Mandela to be placed on the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square to commemorate his tremendous drive to create democracy through peaceful resistance. I would like the government to place a permanent statue in Trafalgar Square in commemoration of this great mans life and his commitment to justice. Please.

rejection.details: For the Mayor's office to decide.
